issue.title: [Java] Support in-place vector sorting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5719](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5719). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support in-place sorting for vectors. An in-place sorter sorts the vector by directly modifying the vector data, so the input and output vectors are the same one.
